about.description1: My name is Melissa Deng. I am a software engineering student at the University of Waterloo by day and an artist at night.
about.description2: Passionate for imagination and problem-solving, I thrive to deliver smooth web experience to users. My ultimate goal is to bridge the gap between creativity and functionality, turning ideas into realities through my coding skills.

experience.description: DRW Holdings is a proprietary trading firm based in Chicago, founded in 1992 by Don Wilson. Within DRW, the NX team is recognized as a leader in the low-latency trading space, building cutting-edge systems that push the limits of performance and efficiency.

bulletPoints.text: Implement an interactive legend feature in the State Timeline plugin of Grafana, an open-source observability dashboard tool, using TypeScript, enabling 60%+ of DRW NX dashboards to migrate to newer versions without losing critical functionality

Developed an AI agent leveraging LangChain to translate user-described device requirements into Telegraf configuration files, automating a typically manual setup process during a 3-day NX GSS hackathon

Tested the accuracy and performance of Meteomatics weather API by validating geographic mapping points using Go and collecting live metrics using Telegraf, informing scalability and integration feasibility for real-time forecasting features

Designed a geo-visual panel in Grafana to plot the DRW NX network on a map with embedded low-latency metrics, improving system-wide observability and enabling faster alerting for engineering and trading teams

experience.description: Intact Financial Corporation (IFC) is a Canadian multinational property and casualty insurance company founded in 1809. With over 30 000 employees, Intact is the largest provider of property & casualty insurance in Canada.

bulletPoints.text: Strengthened the security of all six services within my team by addressing 95% of CVEs in a Spring Boot-based microservices architecture, ensuring timely updates of Maven dependencies to mitigate vulnerabilities and risks

Developed backend features using MapStruct for efficient data mapping and encapsulation, and implemented unit/component tests to improve system functionality, reliability, and efficiency in online purchase processes
Leveraged tools like Kafka, Dynatrace, and test-driven development practices to optimize performance and adapt solutions to Intact's technical and operational context

experience.description: Based in Toronto, The Altitude Platform is a cloud-based media creative platform. It helps users manage and plan their marketing campaign more efficiently while ensuring creativity.

bulletPoints.text: Redesigned the company's marketing website using React.js and Next.js, achieving a 30% increase in user engagement
Developed an interactive dashboard using Vite and TypeScript to track company sales and financial performance
Created over 15 dynamic and interactive ad units with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for successful marketing campaigns
Assisted in the implementation of features powered by OpenAI GPT-4 within the company's platform, leveraging Express.js and adhering to the MVC architecture principles

experience.description: i4i is an independent software company specialized in the delivery of XML / SGML document processing based in Toronto. Besides manual testing, I also worked on an internal tool that simplifies the conversion of Excel data into structured content with unique code numbers, eliminating the need for manual data entry.

bulletPoints.text: Identified 10% of software defects and confirmed 15% of resolved issues using Zoho bug tracking
Delved into different testing types including functional, non-functional, regression, and performance testing
Used XML for configuration and Python (ElementTree) to convert Excel data into structured content with unique code numbers
Enhanced project's portability by standardizing file paths and file I/O
Improved the user interface using Python (Tkinter) to be more user-friendly
